name: mypainquestionnaireufl
title: MyPain Questionnaire
description: A questionnaire to use with the MyPAIN application for a patient to assess their pain levels, locations, and treatments for use in consultation with a clinician to determine further treatments. Created for UFL pilot.

code.display: Please describe the location(s) of any pain you have had in the past 7 days.

item.text: Where is the pain you would like to discuss?

code.display: What type of HEAD pain have you had in the last 7 days?

code.display: What have you tried in the past 6 months to help you with your pain? Select all answers that apply. We also want to know if it worked for you.

item.text: What medications have you tried for pain?

code.display: Over-the-counter pain reliever (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, or Tylenol)

item.prefix: Over-the-counter pain reliever (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, or Tylenol)

code.display: Prescription nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (such as Celebrex)
Prescription nerve pain medication (such as Lyrica, Neurontin, or Cymbalta)

item.prefix: Prescription nerve pain medication (such as Lyrica, Neurontin, or Cymbalta)

code.display: Prescription muscle relaxant (such as Soma or Baclofen)

item.prefix: Prescription muscle relaxant (such as Soma or Baclofen)

code.display: Prescription opioid medication (such as Vicodin, hydrocodone, oxycodone, codeine, morphine, or tramadol)

item.prefix: Prescription opioid medication (such as Vicodin, hydrocodone, oxycodone, codeine, morphine, or tramadol)

code.display: What have you tried in the past 6 months to help you with your pain? Select all answers that apply. We also want to know if it worked for you.

item.text: What specialists have you seen for pain?

code.display: How often have Exercises at home (such as those assigned by a therapist) or outside (such as walking, jogging, swimming) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often have Sleep positioners or devices (such as additional pillows, padding, etc.) you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Stretching you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Weight loss or changes in your diet you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often has Setting and reaching activity goals you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?

item.prefix: Psychologist or counselor (such as for group or individual therapy, acceptance & commitment therapy, cognitive behavior therapy)

code.display: How often has Ice or heat therapy you have tried in the past 6 months helped you with your pain?
How often have Other strategies or methods you have tried in the last 6 months helped with your pain? Please describe

item.text: Other: describe other specialists you have seen for pain (such as neurologist, spine doctor rheumatologist, or physiatrist)Other, please describe
item.prefix: Other: describe other specialists you have seen for pain (such as neurologist, spine doctor rheumatologist, or physiatrist)

code.display: I haven't seen any specialists for pain

item.text: <strong>I haven't seen any specialists for pain.<strong>
item.prefix: I haven't seen any specialists for pain

code.display: Have you used any of the following items you can buy without a prescription from your doctor to help with your pain in the last 6 months (select all that apply)?

item.text: What procedures or physical treatments have you tried for pain?

code.display: How often have Pain relievers (such as Advil, Aleve, Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Motrin, Tylenol) you can buy without a prescription from your doctor that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
How often have Herbal or nutritional pain relievers (such as ginseng or kava kava) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?

item.prefix: Injection (such as a shot to relieve inflammation)

code.display: How often have Cremes, lotions, gels or patches applied to the skin (for example Bengay, Tiger Balm or BioFreeze) that you have used in the last 6 months helped with your pain?
Dry needling or cupping
Acupuncture
Have you used any Other items you can buy without a prescription from your doctor to help with your pain in the last 6 months? Please describe

code.display: Have you used any of the following prescription medications to help with your pain in the last 6 months?

item.text: What topical treatments or devices have you tried for pain?

code.display: How often have prescription Opioid medications (such as hydrocodone, oxycodone, codeine, morphine and fentanyl) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often have prescription Cortisone injections (a shot to relieve inflammation) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?

item.prefix: Topical medications (such as creams, lotions, gel, patches, Bengay, Tiger Balm, Salonpas, Biofreeze, or Lidoderm)

code.display: How often have prescription Non-opioid medications as prescribed by a doctor (such as Celebrex, Cymbalta) helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
How often has Medical marijuana helped with your pain in the last 6 months?
Have you used any Other prescription medications to help with your pain in the last 6 months?: Please describe

code.display: We'd like to know more about you and your goals.
What are your most important activity goals? For example: I'd like to be able to walk without pain.

item.text:
Activity Goals: what goals do you have for your daily activities?

Examples: I want to walk my dog daily. I want to continue to play guitar with my son.

code.display: We'd like to know more about you and your goals.
What are the biggest barriers to achieving your activity goals? For example: I have a lot of stress from work which makes my pain worse.

item.text:
Activity Goals: what are the biggest barriers to achieving your daily activity goals?

Example: I have a lot of stress from work that makes my pain worse.
